title: Robert Hurt Statement on Benghazi Select Committee Hearing (Robert Hurt)
text: ( Source : Robert Hurt ) WASHINGTON, D.C. - Congressman Robert Hurt (R-Virginia) released the following statement after House Select Committee hearing to investigate the terrorist attack on the U.S. Consulate in Benghazi, Libya : 'On September
